about_the_game:
The official game soundtrack for Lord of Rigel, a sci-fi turn based grand space strategy game.

Over two hours of gameplay and cinematic music in Lord of Rigel, composed by Stephen Marciano.

It is intended for personal non-commercial use only.
detailed_description:
